item.title: This One Simple Trick Will Make Sure You Never Misspell 'Characteristics' Again!
item.description: Introduction Do you ever find yourself struggling to remember how to spell the word ‘characteristics’? If so, you’re not alone. Many people have difficulty remembering how to spell this word correctly. Fortunately, there is a simple trick you can use to make sure you never misspell it again! How to Remember Characteristics One way to remember how to spell ‘characteristics’ is to break down the word into smaller parts. The word ‘characteristics’ is made up of two words: ‘character’ and ‘istics’.
